constructArrayList(ResultSet, Object) - Method in class util.DatabaseManager
Takes a member of Object class, returns generic ArrayList The type of ArrayList is returns is determined by the type of the object passed to it, namely callPlay(), callCustomer() etc.

customerLogin() - Method in class model.Controller
Searches the Customer table for a row with given username and password, logs them in if the search returns a positive result, else returns them to the login screen
